metadata.title: CVE-2024-30916 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in eProsima FastDDS v.2.14.0 and before, allows alocal attacker to cause a denial of service (DoS) and obtain sensitiveinformation via a crafted max_samples parameter in DurabilityService QoScomponent.

criterions.comment: fastdds package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
